name: Big Boogie Feet
description:
Alright, I'm done. I'm done. I swear I'm done with the bit after this!
I just wanted to learn how to draw feet, man.

All of the characters are over eighteen years old.

You can complete this whole thing in about three minutes.
Sorry about the screen size, I couldn't figure out how to enlarge it! (ᗒᗩᗕ)
Also, heads up... the opening screen/history GUI is very wonky too. (/□＼*)
